00046 LibSystem::LibSystem()
00047 {
00048 
00049         // Use the regular versions of the files,
00050         // which can be saved over when we quit the program.
00051         BOOKFILE = "LibrarySettings/allBooks.txt";
00052         USERFILE = "LibrarySettings/allUsers.txt";
00053         LOANFILE = "LibrarySettings/allLoans.txt";
00054 
00055         BOOK_RESTORE_FILE = "restoreLibraryDefaults/allBooks.txt";
00056         USER_RESTORE_FILE = "restoreLibraryDefaults/allUsers.txt";
00057         LOAN_RESTORE_FILE = "restoreLibraryDefaults/allLoans.txt";
00058 }

00085 bool LibSystem::saveSystemData()
00086 {
00087         bool verbose = false; // 1 == debug mode  0 == normal mode
00088 
00089         // Uses the regular input / output files.  NEVER write to the backup files (for restoring default settings).
00090         string theBooksFile = BOOKFILE;
00091         string theUsersFile = USERFILE;
00092         string theLoansFile = LOANFILE;
00093 
00094         vector<BookType> bookVector;
00095         books.inOrderDump(bookVector);
00096 
00097         if (BooksLoader::SaveLibraryBooks(verbose,      theBooksFile.c_str(), bookVector))
00098         {
00099                 if (MembersLoader::SaveUsers(verbose,   theUsersFile.c_str(), usersVect))
00100                 {
00101                         if (LoansLoader::SaveLoans(verbose,     theLoansFile.c_str(), loansVect))
00102                         {
00103                                 // Success saving all files.
00104                                 return true;
00105                         }
00106                 }
00107         }
00108         return false;
00109 }

00124 bool LibSystem::init(const bool restore)
00125 {
00126 
00127         bool verbose = false;
00128 
00129         bool loadSuccess;
00130 
00131         string inFileName;
00132 
00133 
00134         // Wipe data
00135         bookMap.clear();
00136         books.destroyTree();
00137         loans.destroyTree();
00138         loansVect.clear();
00139         usersVect.clear();
00140 
00141 
00142 
00143 
00144         string theBooksFile;
00145         string theUsersFile;
00146         string theLoansFile;
00147 
00148         if (restore)
00149         {
00150                 // RESTORE
00151                 // Use the backup versions of the files
00152                 // The program never writes to these files.
00153                 theBooksFile = BOOK_RESTORE_FILE;
00154                 theUsersFile = USER_RESTORE_FILE;
00155                 theLoansFile = LOAN_RESTORE_FILE;
00156         }
00157         else
00158         {
00159                 // NOT RESTORE
00160                 // Use the regular versions of the files,
00161                 // which can be saved over when we quit the program.
00162                 theBooksFile = BOOKFILE;
00163                 theUsersFile = USERFILE;
00164                 theLoansFile = LOANFILE;
00165         }
00166 
00167 
00168 
00169 
00170 
00171         //cout << "Loading all library books..." << endl << endl;
00172 
00173         inFileName = theBooksFile;
00174 
00175         vector<BookType> bookVector;
00176 
00177         loadSuccess = BooksLoader::LoadLibraryBooks(verbose, inFileName.c_str(), bookVector); // 1 == debug mode  0 == normal mode
00178         if (!loadSuccess)
00179         {
00180                 cout << "Error while loading Books." << endl;
00181                 return 0;
00182         }
00183 
00184         /*
00185         // TEST THE BOOK LOADER - MAKE AN EXTRA BOOK and SAVE.
00186         BookType b;
00187                 b.setTitle("Extra Book");
00188                 b.setNumberOfAuthors(4);
00189                 b.setAuthorAt("Mike Gell",       0);
00190                 b.setAuthorAt("Patrick Strauss", 1);
00191                 b.setAuthorAt("Josephine March", 2);
00192                 b.setAuthorAt("Chuck Norris",    3);
00193                 b.setPublisher("Handley Books");
00194                 b.setNumberOfCopiesInStock(1000);
00195                 b.setPrice(50.00);
00196                 b.setIsbn(998877);
00197         bookVector.push_back(b);
00198 
00199         char * outFileName = "allBooks.txt";
00200         BooksLoader::SaveLibraryBooks(1, outFileName, bookVector); // 1 == debug mode  0 == normal mode
00201         */
00202 
00203 
00204 
00205 
00206 
00207         // Build existingBooks map (title --- isbn)
00208 
00209         //cout << "Build Binary Search Tree of BookType objects, and Map of title-isbn..." << endl;
00210 
00211         // We now want to store all the BookType objects in the 'books' BST
00212         // Build the BST of books
00213 
00214         vector<BookType>::iterator currentBook;
00215 
00218         for(currentBook = bookVector.begin(); currentBook != bookVector.end(); currentBook++)
00219         {
00220                 BookType someBook;
00221                 long theKey;
00222                 string bookTitle;
00223 
00224                 someBook = *currentBook;                // Relies upon copy construction
00225 
00226                 someBook.getIsbn(theKey);               // Get the ISBN of this book, to use as the key for our map.
00227                 someBook.getTitle(bookTitle);   // Get the title of the book.
00228 
00229                 bookMap[bookTitle] = theKey;            // Insert (the title of the book) into the map.
00230                 books.insert(someBook); // Insert the BookType into the Binary Search Tree.
00231         }
00232 
00233         //cout << "Done." << endl << endl << endl;
00234 
00235 
00236 
00237 
00238         //cout << "Loading user data..." << endl << endl;
00239 
00240         // Load user data
00241 
00242         inFileName = theUsersFile;
00243 
00244         loadSuccess = MembersLoader::LoadUsers(verbose, inFileName.c_str(), usersVect); // 1 == debug mode  0 == normal mode
00245         if (!loadSuccess)
00246         {
00247                 //cout << "Error while loading Users." << endl;
00248                 return 0;
00249         }
00250 
00251 
00252 
00253 
00254 
00255         /*
00256         // TEST THE USER LOADER - MAKE AN EXTRA MEMBER and SAVE.
00257         MemberType m;
00258                 m.setFirstName                 ( "Homer"   );
00259                 m.setLastName                      ( "Simpson" );
00260                 m.setUserId                    (  5555    );
00261                 m.setAuthority                 ( "patron"  );
00262         usersVect.push_back(m);
00263 
00264         MembersLoader::SaveUsers(1, inFileName, usersVect); // 1 == debug mode  0 == normal mode
00265         */
00266 
00267         userIter = usersVect.begin();
00268 
00269 
00270 
00271 
00272 
00273 
00274         //cout << "Loading loan data..." << endl << endl;
00275 
00276 
00277         // Load loan data
00278 
00279         inFileName = theLoansFile;
00280 
00281         loadSuccess = LoansLoader::LoadLoans(verbose, inFileName.c_str(), loansVect); // 1 == debug mode  0 == normal mode
00282         if (!loadSuccess)
00283         {
00284                 //cout << "Error while loading Loans." << endl;
00285                 return 0;
00286         }
00287 
00288         /*
00289         // TEST THE LOANS LOADER - MAKE AN EXTRA LOAN and SAVE.
00290         BookLoan loan;
00291 
00292                 Date dateBorrowed;
00293                 Date dateDue;
00294 
00295                 dateBorrowed.SetDayOfMonth              (       3                       );
00296                 dateBorrowed.SetMonth                   (       3                       );
00297                 dateBorrowed.SetYear                    (       1113            );
00298 
00299                 dateDue.SetDayOfMonth                   (       4                       );
00300                 dateDue.SetMonth                                (       4                       );
00301                 dateDue.SetYear                                 (       1114            );
00302 
00303                 loan.setBookISBN                ( 444                   );
00304                 loan.setPatronId                ( 1357                  );
00305                 loan.setBorrowedDate            ( dateBorrowed  );
00306                 loan.setDueDate                 ( dateDue               );
00307 
00308         loansVect.push_back(loan);
00309 
00310         cout << "Saving loan data..." << endl << endl;
00311         LoansLoader::SaveLoans(1, inFileName.c_str(), loansVect); // 1 == debug mode  0 == normal mode
00312         */
00313 
00314 
00315 
00316 
00317 
00318 
00319 
00320 
00321         //cout << "Build Binary Search Tree of BookLoan objects..." << endl;
00322 
00323         // We now want to store all the BookLoan objects in the 'loans' BST
00324         // Build the BST of loans
00325 
00326         vector<BookLoan>::iterator currentLoan;
00327 
00330         for(currentLoan = loansVect.begin(); currentLoan != loansVect.end(); currentLoan++)
00331         {
00332                 BookLoan someLoan;
00333                 someLoan = *currentLoan;        // Relies upon copy construction
00334                 loans.insert(someLoan);         // Insert the BookLoan into the Binary Search Tree.
00335         }
00336 
00337 
00338 
00339         //cout << "Done." << endl << endl << endl;
00340         return 1;
00341 
00342 } // </init>

00383 void LibSystem::displayAllUsers()
00384 {
00385         // DISPLAY A LIST OF ALL REGISTERED USERS
00386 
00387         cout << setw(12) << "FirstName";
00388         cout << setw(12) << "LastName";
00389         cout << setw(12) << "ID";
00390         cout << setw(12) << "MemberType" << endl << endl;
00391 
00392 
00393         for(userIter = usersVect.begin(); userIter != usersVect.end(); userIter++)
00394         {
00395                 MemberType mem;
00396 
00397                 mem = *userIter;
00398 
00399                 string fName;
00400                 string lName;
00401                 long uid;
00402                 string auth;
00403 
00404                 mem.getFirstName ( fName );
00405                 mem.getLastName  ( lName );
00406                 mem.getUserId    ( uid );
00407                 mem.getAuthority ( auth );
00408 
00409                 cout << setw(12) << fName;
00410                 cout << setw(12) << lName;
00411                 cout << setw(12) << uid;
00412                 cout << setw(12) << auth << endl;
00413         }
00414 
00415         cout << endl;
00416         cout << endl;
00417         cout << endl;
00418 }

00434 void LibSystem::waitForLogin()
00435 {
00436         // USER CAN NOW LOG IN
00437 
00438         cout << "LIBRARY SYSTEM" << endl;
00439         cout << "---------------------------------" << endl;
00440         cout << "Please enter a user ID to log in." << endl;
00441         cout << endl;
00442 
00443         //cin >> applicantId;
00444 
00445         long applicantId;
00446         string mystr;
00447         getline (cin, mystr);
00448         stringstream(mystr) >> applicantId;
00449 
00450 
00451         // CHECK GIVEN ID AGAINST THE LIST OF USERS.
00452 
00453         for(userIter = usersVect.begin(); userIter != usersVect.end(); userIter++)
00454         {
00455                 MemberType mem;
00456                 mem = *userIter;
00457                 long uid;
00458                 mem.getUserId    ( uid );
00459 
00460                 if (uid == applicantId)
00461                 {
00462                         currentSysUser = mem;
00463 
00464                         string fName;
00465                         string lName;
00466                         string auth;
00467 
00468                         currentSysUser.getFirstName ( fName );
00469                         currentSysUser.getLastName  ( lName );
00470                         currentSysUser.getAuthority ( auth );
00471 
00472                         if (auth == "staff" || auth == "STAFF" || auth == "Staff")
00473                         {
00474                                 admin = true;
00475                         }
00476 
00477                         loggedIn = true;
00478 
00479 
00480                         cout << "Logged in as " << fName << " " << lName << " ("<<auth<<")" << endl;
00481                         cout << endl << endl;
00482                 }
00483         }
00484 }

00495 void LibSystem::displayMainMenu()
00496 {
00497 
00498         cout << endl;
00499 
00500         cout << "MAIN MENU." << endl;
00501         cout << "------------------------------------------" << endl;
00502         cout << "Please enter a choice from the menu below." << endl;
00503 
00504         cout << endl;
00505         cout << "(1) Borrow book(s)"             << endl;
00506         cout << "(2) Return book(s)"             << endl;
00507         cout << "(3) Renew book(s)"              << endl;
00508         cout << "(4) Check current loans"        << endl;
00509 
00510         if(admin)
00511         {
00512                 cout << endl;
00513                 cout << "(5) Add books to the library"   << endl;
00514                 cout << "(6) Add patrons to the library" << endl;
00515         }
00516 
00517         cout << endl;
00518         cout << "(7) Shut down system"           << endl;
00519         cout << endl;
00520         cout << "(9) Log out" << endl;
00521 
00522         if(admin)
00523         {
00524                 cout << endl;
00525                 cout << "(0) Restore system to default settings." << endl;
00526         }
00527 
00528         cout << endl;
00529         cout << endl;
00530         cout << endl;
00531 }

00544 void LibSystem::renewBookLoan(BookLoan & theLoan)
00545 {
00546 
00547         long theKey;
00548         theLoan.getBookISBN(theKey);
00549 
00550         // Set the borrowed date to today.
00551         Date bDate;
00552         setToToday(bDate);
00553         theLoan.setBorrowedDate(bDate);
00554 
00555         // Set the due date to the borrowed date + 1 month
00556         unsigned mon;
00557         bDate.GetMonth(mon);
00558         ++mon;
00559         if (mon == 13)
00560         {
00561                 mon = 1;
00562         }
00563         bDate.SetMonth(mon);
00564         theLoan.setDueDate(bDate);
00565 
00566         // Update the BST of loans
00567         loans.replaceNode(theKey, theLoan); //search by key, then replace data of node if found.
00568 
00569         // NEED TO UPDATE LOANSVECT
00570 }

00581 void LibSystem::renewBook()
00582 {
00583 
00584         string confirm;
00585 
00586         bool again = true;
00587 
00588         while(again)
00589         {
00590                 bool userHasLoans = true;
00591 
00592                 if (!loansVect.size())
00593                 {
00594                         userHasLoans = false;
00595                 }
00596 
00597                 if (!userHasLoans)
00598                 {
00599                         cout << "The current user does not have any books on loan." << endl;
00600                         cout << endl;
00601                         cout << "Please press ENTER to go back to the main menu." << endl;
00602                         cout << endl;
00603                         cout << endl;
00604                         confirm = "";
00605                         getline (cin, confirm);
00606 
00607                         again = false;
00608                         return;
00609                 }
00610 
00611                 // LIST ALL BOOKS ON LOAN TO THE CURRENT USER.
00612 
00613                 unsigned currentLoans;
00614                 currentLoans = 0;
00615 
00616                 vector<BookType> loansToUser;
00617                 vector<BookLoan> updateArr;
00618                 vector<unsigned> updateIdxArr;
00619 
00620                 cout << "Books on loan to the current user:";
00621 
00622                 // For all loans
00623                 vector<BookLoan>::iterator currentLoan;
00624                 for(currentLoan = loansVect.begin(); currentLoan != loansVect.end(); currentLoan++)
00625                 {
00626                         BookLoan someLoan;
00627                         someLoan = *currentLoan;
00628 
00629                         long somePatronId;
00630                         someLoan.getPatronId(somePatronId);
00631 
00632                         long myPatronId;
00633                         currentSysUser.getUserId(myPatronId);
00634 
00635                         // This loan belongs to the current user.
00636                         if (somePatronId == myPatronId)
00637                         {
00638                                 // Get the isbn of the loan.
00639                                 long isbn;
00640                                 someLoan.getBookISBN(isbn);
00641 
00642                                 if (books.searchByKey(isbn))
00643                                 {
00644                                         // We have a book for the isbn of the loan.
00645 
00646                                         if(!currentLoans)
00647                                         {
00648                                                 cout << endl;
00649                                         }
00650 
00651                                         updateIdxArr.push_back(currentLoans);
00652                                         currentLoans ++;
00653 
00654                                         // Retrieve the book details
00655                                         BookType b;
00656                                         books.getNodeValue(isbn, b);
00657 
00658                                         cout << endl;
00659                                         cout << "ITEM (" << currentLoans << ")" << endl;
00660                                         string spc;
00661                                         spc = "   ";
00662 
00663                                         cout << endl;
00665                                         displayLoanDetails(spc, someLoan); // calls displayBookDetails() and displayDate()
00666 
00667                                         loansToUser.push_back(b);
00668                                         updateArr.push_back(someLoan);
00669                                 }
00670                         }
00671                 }
00672 
00673 
00674                 cout << endl;
00675 
00676                 if (currentLoans)
00677                 {
00678                         cout << "Type the number of an ITEM to renew it." << endl;
00679                         cout << "Or press ENTER to go back to the main menu." << endl;
00680                         cout << endl;
00681                         confirm = "";
00682                         getline (cin, confirm);
00683                         cout << endl;
00684                         if(confirm.length())
00685                         {
00686                                 stringstream ss;
00687                                 unsigned idx;
00688                                 ss << confirm;
00689                                 ss >> idx;
00690                                 idx -= 1; // menu is 1 based but we want 0 based.
00691 
00692                                 BookType bRet = loansToUser[idx];
00693                                 string spc;
00694                                 spc = "     ";
00695                                 cout << spc << "Book to renew: " << endl;
00696                                 cout << endl;
00697                                 cout << spc << "---------------" << endl;
00698                                 displayBookDetails(spc, bRet);
00699                                 cout << spc << "---------------" << endl;
00700                                 cout << endl;
00701                                 cout << spc << "Type (1) to confirm." << endl;
00702                                 cout << spc << "Or press ENTER to cancel." << endl;
00703                                 cout << endl;
00704                                 cout << spc;
00705                                 confirm = "";
00706                                 getline (cin, confirm);
00707                                 if(confirm.length())
00708                                 {
00709                                         // Change the date borrowed to today.
00710                                         // Set the due date to one month from today.
00711 
00712                                         BookLoan theLoan;
00713                                         theLoan = updateArr[idx];
00714 
00715                                         renewBookLoan(theLoan);
00716 
00717                                         // Update the loans vector.
00718                                         // Replace the existing loan value with the new one.
00719                                         unsigned vectIdx = updateIdxArr[idx];
00720                                         loansVect[vectIdx] = theLoan; // This should directly affect loansVect
00721 
00722                                         cout << endl;
00723                                         cout << endl;
00724                                         cout << "Book has been renewed. Please press ENTER." << endl;
00725                                         cout << endl;
00726                                         confirm = "";
00727                                         getline (cin, confirm);
00728                                         cout << endl;
00729                                         cout << endl;
00730                                 }
00731                         }
00732                         else
00733                         {
00734                                 again = false;
00735                                 return;
00736                         }
00737                         // back to main menu
00738                 }
00739                 else
00740                 {
00741                         cout << "None." << endl;
00742                         cout << endl;
00743                         cout << endl;
00744                         cout << "Please press ENTER to go back to the main menu." << endl;
00745                         cout << endl;
00746                         cout << endl;
00747                         confirm = "";
00748                         getline (cin, confirm);
00749 
00750                         again = false;
00751                         return;
00752                 }
00753         }// again
00754 
00755 
00756 }

00762 
00768 void LibSystem::mainMenuResponse()
00769 {
00770         unsigned inputUint;
00771         string mystr;
00772         getline (cin, mystr);
00773         stringstream(mystr) >> inputUint;
00774 
00775         //cin >> inputUint;
00776 
00777         switch(inputUint)
00778         {
00779                 case 0:
00780                         if (admin)
00781                         {
00782                                 cout << "(MAIN MENU) -> RESTORE SYSTEM TO DEFAULT SETTINGS" << endl;
00783                                 cout << "-----------------------------" << endl << endl;
00784                                 init(1);
00785                                 cout << "Library System has reverted to default settings." << endl;
00786                                 cout << "(Books, Users and Loans have all been affected.)" << endl;
00787                                 cout << endl;
00788                                 cout << "Press ENTER to return to the main menu." << endl;
00789                                 cout << endl;
00790                                 getline (cin, mystr);
00791                                 cout << endl;
00792                                 cout << endl;
00793                         }
00794                 break;
00795 
00796 
00797 
00798                 case 1:
00799                         // Borrow Book(s)
00800                         cout << "(MAIN MENU) -> BORROW BOOK(s)" << endl;
00801                         cout << "-----------------------------" << endl << endl;
00802                         promptBorrowBook();
00803                 break;
00804 
00805                 case 2:
00806                         // Return Book(s)
00807                         cout << "(MAIN MENU) -> RETURN BOOK(s)" << endl;
00808                         cout << "-----------------------------" << endl << endl;
00809                         promptReturnBook();
00810                 break;
00811 
00812                 case 3:
00813                         // Renew Book(s)
00814                         cout << "(MAIN MENU) -> RENEW BOOK(s)" << endl;
00815                         cout << "----------------------------" << endl << endl;
00816                         renewBook();
00817                 break;
00818 
00819                 case 4:
00820                         // Check current loans
00821                         cout << "(MAIN MENU) -> CHECK CURRENT LOANS" << endl;
00822                         cout << "----------------------------------" << endl << endl;
00823                         showLoansForCurrentUser();
00824                         cout << endl;
00825                         cout << endl;
00826                         cout << "Press ENTER to return to the main menu." << endl;
00827                         cout << endl;
00828                         getline (cin, mystr);
00829                         cout << endl;
00830                         cout << endl;
00831                 break;
00832 
00833 
00834                 case 5:
00835                 if (admin)
00836                 {
00837                         // Add books to the library
00838                         cout << "(MAIN MENU) -> ADD BOOK(s)" << endl;
00839                         cout << "--------------------------" << endl << endl;
00840                         staffAddBooks();
00841                 }
00842                 break;
00843 
00844                 case 6:
00845                 if (admin)
00846                 {
00847                         // Add patrons to the library
00848                         cout << "(MAIN MENU) -> ADD PATRON(s)" << endl;
00849                         cout << "----------------------------" << endl << endl;
00850                         while(staffAddPatrons())
00851                         {
00852                                 // add another patron
00853                         }
00854                 }
00855                 break;
00856 
00857                 case 7:
00858                 //if (admin)
00859                 //{
00860                         // Shut down system
00861                         cout << "Shutting down system." << endl;
00862 
00863                         admin    = false;
00864                         loggedIn = false;
00865                         running  = false;
00866 
00867                         if (!saveSystemData())// Save users, loans and books to the non-restore text files.
00868                         {
00869                                 cout << endl;
00870                                 cout << endl;
00871                                 cout << "Failed to save settings.\n System will use the defaults next time it starts up." << endl;
00872                                 cout << endl;
00873                                 cout << "Press ENTER to finish." << endl;
00874                                 getline (cin, mystr);
00875                                 cout << endl;
00876                                 cout << endl;
00877                         }
00878                         else
00879                         {
00880                                 cout << endl;
00881                                 cout << endl;
00882                                 cout << "Saved Book settings to " << BOOKFILE << endl;
00883                                 cout << "Saved User settings to " << USERFILE << endl;
00884                                 cout << "Saved Loan settings to " << LOANFILE << endl;
00885                                 cout << endl;
00886                                 cout << "   These settings will be loaded, next time the system starts up." << endl;
00887                                 cout << endl;
00888                                 cout << "Press ENTER to finish." << endl;
00889                                 getline (cin, mystr);
00890                                 cout << endl;
00891                                 cout << endl;
00892                         }
00893                 //}
00894                 break;
00895 
00896 
00897 
00898 
00899 
00900                 case 9:
00901                         // Log out
00902                         cout << "Logged out." << endl;
00903                         admin    = false;
00904                         loggedIn = false;
00905                 break;
00906         }
00907 }

00913 
00914 
00919 void LibSystem::printAllVolumes()
00920 {
00921         // We are searching every record, so we don't need bst features
00922 
00923         // Dump all books into a vector
00924         vector<BookType> allBks;
00925         books.inOrderDump(allBks);
00926 
00927 
00928         // For every book:
00929         vector<BookType>::iterator currBk;
00930         for(currBk = allBks.begin(); currBk != allBks.end(); currBk++)
00931         {
00932 
00933                 // Get book
00934                 BookType bk;
00935                 bk = *currBk;
00936 
00937                 // Get title
00938                 string outStr;
00939                 bk.getTitle(outStr);
00940 
00941                 // Fetch the ISBN
00942                 long volumeSearchKey = bookMap[outStr];
00943 
00944                 if(!loans.isEmpty())
00945                 {
00946                         // There are loans
00947                         if (!loans.searchByKey(volumeSearchKey))
00948                         {
00949                                 //cout << "Available:      " << outStr << endl;
00950                                 cout << "     " << outStr << endl;
00951                         }
00952                         else
00953                         {
00954                                 //cout << "loan:" << outStr << endl;
00955                         }
00956                 }
00957                 else
00958                 {
00959                         // There are no loans
00960                         cout << "     " << outStr << endl;
00961                 }
00962         }
00963 }
00964 
00965 
00966 
00967 
00974 unsigned LibSystem::availableCount()
00975 {
00976         unsigned countOfAvailableBooks = 0;
00977 
00978         vector<BookType> allBks;
00979         books.inOrderDump(allBks);
00980         vector<BookType>::iterator currBk;
00981 
00982         // For every book:
00983         for(currBk = allBks.begin(); currBk != allBks.end(); currBk++)
00984         {
00985                 // Fetch the ISBN of the book
00986                 long volumeSearchKey;
00987                 BookType bk;
00988                 bk = *currBk;
00989                 bk.getIsbn(volumeSearchKey);
00990 
00991                 // Don't print items that are currently on loan.
00992 
00993                 // If there are loans
00994                 if(!loans.isEmpty())
00995                 {
00996                         // If there is no loan for this volume
00997                         if (!loans.searchByKey(volumeSearchKey))
00998                         {
00999                                 countOfAvailableBooks++;
01000                         }
01001                 }
01002                 else
01003                 {
01004                         //There are no loans at the moment.
01005                         countOfAvailableBooks++;
01006                 }
01007         }
01008         return countOfAvailableBooks;
01009 }
01010

01012 
01013 
01014 
01023 bool LibSystem::isLoaned(long & isbn)
01024 {
01025         // If there are loans
01026         if(!loans.isEmpty())
01027         {
01028                 return loans.searchByKey(isbn);
01029         }
01030         return false;
01031 }

01035 
01036 
01043 void LibSystem::setToToday(Date & someDate)
01044 {
01045         // Get the current time.
01046 
01047         time_t timeMs1970;
01048         struct tm * theTime;
01049         time ( &timeMs1970 );
01050         theTime = localtime ( &timeMs1970 );
01051 
01052         unsigned day =                  (unsigned)theTime->tm_mday;             // tm struct gives day of the month             1-31
01053         unsigned mon = 1 +              (unsigned)theTime->tm_mon;              // tm struct gives months since January 0-11
01054         unsigned yr  = 1900 +   (unsigned)theTime->tm_year;             // tm struct gives years since 1900
01055 
01056         someDate.SetDayOfMonth(day);
01057         someDate.SetMonth(mon);
01058         someDate.SetYear(yr);
01059 }
01060 
01061 
01066 void LibSystem::promptBorrowBook()
01067 {
01068         bool again = true;
01069         string confirm;
01070 
01071         while(again)
01072         {
01073                 if (availableCount() < 1)
01074                 {
01075                         cout << endl;
01076                         cout << endl;
01077                         cout << "   Sorry, no books are currently available." << endl;
01078                         cout << endl;
01079                         cout << endl;
01080                         cout << "   Please press RETURN." << endl;
01081                         confirm = "";
01082                         getline (cin, confirm);
01083                         cout << endl;
01084                         cout << endl;
01085                         cout << endl;
01086                         cout << endl;
01087 
01088                         again = false;
01089                 }
01090                 else
01091                 {
01092                         // books are available
01093                         cout << "The following volumes are available for borrowing." << endl << endl;
01094 
01095                         printAllVolumes();
01096 
01097                         string requestedTitle;
01098 
01099                         cout << endl;
01100                         cout << "Please enter the title of a volume that you would like to borrow," << endl << endl;
01101                         cout << "Or RETURN, to cancel." << endl;
01102                         cout << endl;
01103                         cout << endl;
01104                         getline (cin, requestedTitle);
01105 
01106 
01107                         if (requestedTitle.length())
01108                         {
01109                                 long bisbn;
01110                                 bisbn = bookMap[requestedTitle];
01111 
01112                                 if (bisbn)
01113                                 {
01114                                         // Confirm borrowing of book.
01115 
01116                                         cout << endl;
01117                                         cout << "You entered " << requestedTitle << "  isbn: " << bisbn << endl;
01118                                         cout << endl;
01119 
01120                                         if (isLoaned(bisbn))
01121                                         {
01122                                                 cout << "   Sorry, that book is currently on loan." << endl;
01123                                                 cout << "   There is currently no facility available to reserve it either." << endl;
01124                                                 cout << endl;
01125                                                 cout << endl;
01126                                                 cout << "   Please press RETURN." << endl;
01127                                                 cout << endl;
01128                                                 cout << endl;
01129                                                 confirm = "";
01130                                                 getline (cin, confirm);
01131                                                 cout << endl;
01132                                                 cout << endl;
01133                                                 cout << endl;
01134                                                 cout << endl;
01135                                         }
01136                                         else
01137                                         {
01138                                                 cout << "   Press (1) to borrow this book," << endl;
01139                                                 cout << "   Or RETURN, to cancel." << endl << endl;
01140                                                 cout << endl;
01141                                                 confirm = "";
01142                                                 getline (cin, confirm);
01143 
01144                                                 if (confirm.length())
01145                                                 {
01146                                                         // Borrow the book.
01147 
01148                                                         long currId;
01149                                                         currentSysUser.getUserId(currId);
01150 
01151                                                         Date today;
01152                                                         Date dueBack;
01153 
01154                                                         setToToday(today);
01155                                                         setToToday(dueBack);
01156 
01157                                                         unsigned mm;
01158                                                         dueBack.GetMonth(mm);
01159                                                         mm ++;
01160                                                         if (mm == 13)
01161                                                         {
01162                                                                 mm = 1;
01163                                                         }
01164                                                         dueBack.SetMonth(mm);
01165 
01166                                                         BookLoan bloan;
01167                                                         bloan.setBookISBN(bisbn);
01168                                                         bloan.setPatronId(currId);
01169                                                         bloan.setBorrowedDate(today);
01170                                                         bloan.setDueDate(dueBack);
01171 
01172                                                         loans.insert(bloan);            // Insert into bst
01173                                                         loansVect.push_back(bloan);     // Insert into loansVect
01174 
01175                                                         // Any books left?
01176                                                         cout << endl;
01177                                                         if (availableCount())
01178                                                         {
01179                                                                 cout << "Borrow another book? (y/n)" << endl;
01180                                                                 cout << endl;
01181                                                                 confirm = "";
01182                                                                 getline (cin, confirm);
01183                                                         }
01184                                                         else
01185                                                         {
01186                                                                 cout << "No books left." << endl;
01187                                                                 again = false; // Done borrowing books.
01188                                                                 cout << endl;
01189                                                         }
01190                                                         cout << endl;
01191                                                         cout << endl;
01192                                                         cout << endl;
01193 
01194                                                         if (!confirm.length() || confirm == "n" || confirm == "N" || confirm == "no" || confirm == "NO" || confirm == "No")
01195                                                         {
01196                                                                 again = false; // Done borrowing books.
01197                                                         }
01198                                                 }
01199                                                 else
01200                                                 {
01201                                                         again = false; // Done borrowing books.
01202                                                 }
01203                                         }
01204 
01205                                 }
01206                                 else
01207                                 {
01208                                         cout << endl;
01209                                         cout << endl;
01210                                         cout << endl;
01211                                         cout << endl;
01212                                         cout << "Sorry, there is no book by that title." << endl << endl;
01213                                 }
01214                         }
01215                         else
01216                         {
01217                                 again = false; // Done borrowing books.
01218                         }
01219                 }
01220         }
01221 }

01224 
01225 
01230 void LibSystem::showLoansForCurrentUser()
01231 {
01232         unsigned currentLoans = 0;
01233 
01234         // For all loans
01235         vector<BookLoan>::iterator currentLoan;
01236         for(currentLoan = loansVect.begin(); currentLoan != loansVect.end(); currentLoan++)
01237         {
01238                 BookLoan someLoan;
01239                 someLoan = *currentLoan;
01240 
01241                 long somePatronId;
01242                 someLoan.getPatronId(somePatronId);
01243 
01244                 long myPatronId;
01245                 currentSysUser.getUserId(myPatronId);
01246 
01247                 // This loan belongs to the current user.
01248                 if (somePatronId == myPatronId)
01249                 {
01250                         // Get the isbn of the loan.
01251                         long isbn;
01252                         someLoan.getBookISBN(isbn);
01253 
01254                         if (books.searchByKey(isbn))
01255                         {
01256                                 // We have a book for the isbn of the loan.
01257                                 currentLoans ++;
01258                                 cout << endl;
01259                                 cout << "ITEM (" << currentLoans << ")" << endl;
01260                                 string spc;
01261                                 spc = "   ";
01262                                 cout << endl;
01263                                 displayLoanDetails(spc, someLoan); // calls displayBookDetails() and displayDate()
01264                         }
01265                 }
01266         }
01267 }

01272 
01282 void LibSystem::displayLoanDetails(string spacer, const BookLoan & b) const
01283 {
01284         long theIsbn;
01285         long patId;
01286         Date borDate;
01287         Date dueDate;
01288 
01289         string e = "";
01290 
01291         b.getBookISBN(theIsbn);
01292         b.getPatronId    ( patId);
01293         b.getBorrowedDate( borDate);
01294         b.getDueDate     ( dueDate);
01295 
01296         BookType theBook;
01297         books.getNodeValue(theIsbn, theBook);
01298 
01299         cout << spacer << "Book details:" << endl;
01300 
01301         string spacer2(spacer);
01302         spacer2.append("   ");
01303 
01304         displayBookDetails(spacer2, theBook);
01305 
01306         cout << endl;
01307         cout << spacer  << "Loan details: " << endl;
01308         cout << spacer2 << "ISBN        : " << theIsbn << endl;
01309         cout << spacer2 << "borrower ID : " << patId << endl;
01310 
01311         cout << spacer2 << "Borrowed    : ";
01312         displayDate(e, borDate);
01313 
01314         cout << spacer2 << "Due         : ";
01315         displayDate(e, dueDate);
01316 
01317 }
01318

01320 
01329 void LibSystem::displayDate(string spacer, const Date & d) const
01330 {
01331         unsigned dd;
01332         string mstr;
01333         unsigned yyyy;
01334 
01335         d.GetDayOfMonth(dd);
01336         d.GetMonthStr(mstr);
01337         d.GetYear(yyyy);
01338 
01339         cout << spacer << dd << " " << mstr << " " << yyyy << endl;
01340 }

01347 
01356 void LibSystem::displayBookDetails(string spacer, const BookType & b) const
01357 {
01358         string   volumeTitle;
01359         string   volumePublisher;
01360         long     volumeIsbn;
01361         double   volumePrice;
01362         unsigned volumeCopies;
01363         unsigned volumeAuthCount;
01364 
01365         b.getTitle(volumeTitle);
01366         b.getNumberOfAuthors(volumeAuthCount);
01367         b.getPublisher(volumePublisher);
01368         b.getIsbn(volumeIsbn);
01369         b.getPrice(volumePrice);
01370         b.getNumberOfCopiesInStock(volumeCopies);
01371 
01372         cout << spacer << "Title        : " << volumeTitle << endl;
01373         cout << spacer << "#Authors     : " << volumeAuthCount << endl;
01374 
01375         string authorName;
01376         for(unsigned aaa = 0; aaa < volumeAuthCount; aaa++)
01377         {
01378                 b.getAuthorAt(authorName, aaa);
01379                 cout << spacer << " Author " << (aaa + 1) << "    : " << authorName << ",   " << endl;
01380         }
01381 
01382         cout << spacer << "Publisher    : " << volumePublisher  << endl;
01383         cout << spacer << "ISBN         : " << volumeIsbn                       << endl;
01384         cout << spacer << "Price        : " << volumePrice              << endl;
01385         cout << spacer << "Copies       : " << volumeCopies             << endl;
01386         //cout << endl;
01387 }

01395 
01400 void LibSystem::promptReturnBook()
01401 {
01402         string confirm;
01403 
01404         bool again = true;
01405 
01406         vector<vector<BookLoan>::iterator> deletionIterators;
01407 
01408 
01409         while(again)
01410         {
01411                 bool userHasLoans = true;
01412 
01413                 if (!loansVect.size())
01414                 {
01415                         userHasLoans = false;
01416                 }
01417 
01418                 if (!userHasLoans)
01419                 {
01420                         cout << "The current user does not have any books on loan." << endl;
01421                         cout << endl;
01422                         cout << "Please press ENTER to go back to the main menu." << endl;
01423                         cout << endl;
01424                         cout << endl;
01425                         confirm = "";
01426                         getline (cin, confirm);
01427 
01428                         again = false;
01429                         return;
01430                 }
01431 
01432                 // LIST ALL BOOKS ON LOAN TO THE CURRENT USER.
01433 
01434                 unsigned currentLoans;
01435                 currentLoans = 0;
01436 
01437                 vector<BookType> loansToUser;
01438                 vector<BookLoan> delArr;
01439 
01440                 cout << "Books on loan to the current user:";
01441 
01442                 // For all loans
01443                 vector<BookLoan>::iterator currentLoan;
01444                 for(currentLoan = loansVect.begin(); currentLoan != loansVect.end(); currentLoan++)
01445                 {
01446                         BookLoan someLoan;
01447                         someLoan = *currentLoan;
01448 
01449                         long somePatronId;
01450                         someLoan.getPatronId(somePatronId);
01451 
01452                         long myPatronId;
01453                         currentSysUser.getUserId(myPatronId);
01454 
01455                         // This loan belongs to the current user.
01456                         if (somePatronId == myPatronId)
01457                         {
01458                                 // Get the isbn of the loan.
01459                                 long isbn;
01460                                 someLoan.getBookISBN(isbn);
01461 
01462                                 if (books.searchByKey(isbn))
01463                                 {
01464                                         // We have a book for the isbn of the loan.
01465 
01466                                         if(!currentLoans)
01467                                         {
01468                                                 cout << endl;
01469                                         }
01470 
01471                                         currentLoans ++;
01472 
01473                                         // Retrieve the book details
01474                                         BookType b;
01475                                         books.getNodeValue(isbn, b);
01476 
01477                                         cout << endl;
01478                                         cout << "ITEM (" << currentLoans << ")" << endl;
01479                                         string spc;
01480                                         spc = "   ";
01481 
01482                                         cout << endl;
01484                                         displayLoanDetails(spc, someLoan); // calls displayBookDetails() and displayDate()
01485 
01486                                         loansToUser.push_back(b);
01487                                         delArr.push_back(someLoan);
01488                                         deletionIterators.push_back(currentLoan);
01489                                 }
01490                         }
01491                 }
01492 
01493 
01494                 cout << endl;
01495 
01496                 if (currentLoans)
01497                 {
01498                         cout << "Type the number of an ITEM to return it." << endl;
01499                         cout << "Or press ENTER to go back to the main menu." << endl;
01500                         cout << endl;
01501                         confirm = "";
01502                         getline (cin, confirm);
01503                         cout << endl;
01504                         if(confirm.length())
01505                         {
01506                                 stringstream ss;
01507                                 unsigned idx;
01508                                 ss << confirm;
01509                                 ss >> idx;
01510 
01511                                 BookType bRet = loansToUser[idx - 1];
01512                                 string spc;
01513                                 spc = "     ";
01514                                 cout << spc << "Book to return: " << endl;
01515                                 cout << endl;
01516                                 cout << spc << "---------------" << endl;
01517                                 displayBookDetails(spc, bRet);
01518                                 cout << spc << "---------------" << endl;
01519                                 cout << endl;
01520                                 cout << spc << "Type (1) to confirm." << endl;
01521                                 cout << spc << "Or press ENTER to cancel." << endl;
01522                                 cout << endl;
01523                                 cout << spc;
01524                                 confirm = "";
01525                                 getline (cin, confirm);
01526                                 if(confirm.length())
01527                                 {
01528                                         // Delete from BST
01529                                         BookLoan l;
01530                                         l = delArr[idx - 1];
01531                                         loans.deleteNode(l);
01532 
01533                                         // Delete from loans vector.
01534                                         vector<BookLoan>::iterator deletionIter;
01535                                         deletionIter = deletionIterators[idx - 1];
01536                                         loansVect.erase(deletionIter);
01537 
01538                                         cout << endl;
01539                                         cout << endl;
01540                                         cout << "Book has been returned." << endl;
01541                                         cout << endl;
01542                                         cout << endl;
01543                                 }
01544                         }
01545                         else
01546                         {
01547                                 again = false;
01548                                 return;
01549                         }
01550                         // back to main menu
01551                 }
01552                 else
01553                 {
01554                         cout << "None." << endl;
01555                         cout << endl;
01556                         cout << endl;
01557                         cout << "Please press ENTER to go back to the main menu." << endl;
01558                         cout << endl;
01559                         cout << endl;
01560                         confirm = "";
01561                         getline (cin, confirm);
01562 
01563                         again = false;
01564                         return;
01565                 }
01566         }// again
01567 }

01578 
01583 void LibSystem::staffAddBooks()
01584 {
01585         bool again = true;
01586 
01587         while(again)
01588         {
01589                 BookType book;
01590 
01591                 string mystr;
01592 
01593                 string title;
01594                 string publisher;
01595                 long isbn;
01596                 double price;
01597                 unsigned numberOfCopiesInStock;
01598                 unsigned numberOfAuthors;
01599 
01600                 cout << "Enter title of book:";
01601                 getline (cin, title);
01602                 //stringstream(mystr) >> title;
01603 
01604                 cout << endl;
01605                 cout << "Enter publisher:";
01606                 getline (cin, publisher);
01607                 //stringstream(mystr) >> publisher;
01608 
01609                 cout << endl;
01610                 cout << "Enter ISBN:";
01611                 getline (cin, mystr);
01612                 stringstream(mystr) >> isbn;
01613 
01614                 cout << endl;
01615                 cout << "Enter price:";
01616                 getline (cin, mystr);
01617                 stringstream(mystr) >> price;
01618 
01619                 cout << endl;
01620                 cout << "Enter number of copies available:";
01621                 getline (cin, mystr);
01622                 stringstream(mystr) >> numberOfCopiesInStock;
01623 
01624                 cout << endl;
01625                 cout << "Enter number of authors:";
01626                 getline (cin, mystr);
01627                 stringstream(mystr) >> numberOfAuthors;
01628 
01629                 if (numberOfAuthors > 4)
01630                 {
01631                         cout << "Enter number of authors has been set to 4 (max)";
01632                         numberOfAuthors = 4;
01633                 }
01634 
01635                 book.setTitle                 ( title);
01636                 book.setPublisher             ( publisher);
01637                 book.setIsbn                  ( isbn);
01638                 book.setPrice                 ( price);
01639                 book.setNumberOfCopiesInStock ( numberOfCopiesInStock);
01640                 book.setNumberOfAuthors       ( numberOfAuthors);
01641 
01642                 string auth;
01643                 for(unsigned aaaa = 0; aaaa < numberOfAuthors; aaaa++)
01644                 {
01645                         cout << endl;
01646                         cout << "Enter author ("<<(aaaa+1)<<"): ";
01647                         getline (cin, auth);
01648                         //stringstream(mystr) >> auth;
01649                         book.setAuthorAt ( auth, aaaa);
01650                 }
01651                 // Finished manual construction of book.
01652 
01653 
01654 
01655                 // Show the book details
01656                 cout << endl;
01657                 cout << endl;
01658                 string spc = "     ";
01659                 cout << spc << "Finished entering book details: " << endl;
01660                 cout << endl;
01661                 cout << spc << "---------------" << endl;
01662                 displayBookDetails(spc, book);
01663                 cout << spc << "---------------" << endl;
01664 
01665 
01666 
01667                 string confirm = "";
01668                 while(!confirm.length())
01669                 {
01670                         // Ask to commit.
01671                         cout << "Do you want to add this book to the library? (y/n)" << endl;
01672                         cout << endl;
01673                         confirm = "";
01674                         getline (cin, confirm);
01675                         if (confirm == "y" || confirm == "Y" || confirm == "yes" || confirm == "YES" || confirm == "Yes")
01676                         {
01677                                 // Commit
01678                                 books.insert(book);
01679                                 bookMap[title] = isbn;
01680                                 cout << "Book has been added to the library." << endl;
01681                                 cout << endl;
01682                         }
01683                         else
01684                         {
01685                                 // Discard
01686                                 cout << "New book details have been discarded." << endl;
01687                                 cout << endl;
01688                         }
01689                 }
01690 
01691 
01692                 cout << endl;
01693                 cout << endl;
01694                 cout << "Add another book? (y/n)" << endl;
01695                 cout << endl;
01696                 confirm = "";
01697                 getline (cin, confirm);
01698                 if (!confirm.length() || confirm == "n" || confirm == "N" || confirm == "no" || confirm == "NO" || confirm == "No")
01699                 {
01700                         again = false; // Done borrowing books.
01701                 }
01702                 cout << endl;
01703                 cout << endl;
01704                 cout << endl;
01705         }
01706 }
01707 
01708 
01709 
01710 
01719 bool LibSystem::userExists(const long applicantId) const
01720 {
01721         vector<MemberType>::const_iterator cIter;
01722 
01723         for(cIter = usersVect.begin(); cIter != usersVect.end(); cIter++)
01724         {
01725                 MemberType mem;
01726                 mem = *cIter;
01727                 long uid;
01728                 mem.getUserId(uid);
01729 
01730                 if (uid == applicantId)
01731                 {
01732                         return true;
01733                 }
01734         }
01735         return false;
01736 }
01737 
01738 
01739 
01740 
01741 
01742 
01747 bool LibSystem::staffAddPatrons()
01748 {
01749         bool again = true;
01750 
01751         while(again)
01752         {
01753                 string mystr;
01754 
01755                 MemberType patron;
01756 
01757                 string firstName;
01758                 string lastName;
01759                 long userId;
01760                 string authorisationLevel;
01761 
01762 
01763 
01764                 // Get the new user details.
01765 
01766                 // Get a user ID that is not already taken.
01768                 do
01769                 {
01770                         cout << "Please provide a numeric ID\n(one that is not already taken)\nfor this new Patron:";
01771                         getline (cin, mystr);
01772                         if (!mystr.length())
01773                         {
01774                                 again = false;
01775                                 return true;  // Back to top of function.
01776                         }
01777                         stringstream(mystr) >> userId;
01778                 }
01779                 while (userExists(userId));
01780                 cout << endl;
01781 
01782 
01783 
01784 
01785                 // staff or regular user
01787                 bool authGood = false;
01788                 do
01789                 {
01790 
01791                         cout << "Select authorisation level:" << endl;
01792                         cout << "     (1) Regular User" << endl;
01793                         cout << "     (2) Library Staff" << endl;
01794                         cout << "     " << endl;
01795                         getline (cin, mystr);
01796                         if (mystr == "1")
01797                         {
01798                                 authorisationLevel = "patron";
01799                                 authGood = true;
01800                         }
01801                         else if (mystr == "2")
01802                         {
01803                                 authorisationLevel = "staff";
01804                                 authGood = true;
01805                         }
01806                         cout << endl;
01807                 }
01808                 while(!authGood);
01809 
01810 
01811 
01812 
01814                 do
01815                 {
01816                         cout << "Enter first name:";
01817                         getline (cin, firstName);
01818                         cout << endl;
01819                 }
01820                 while(!firstName.length());
01821 
01822 
01823 
01825                 do
01826                 {
01827                         cout << "Enter last name:";
01828                         getline (cin, lastName);
01829                         cout << endl;
01830                 }
01831                 while(!lastName.length());
01832 
01833 
01834 
01835                 // Construct the new user
01837                 patron.setFirstName(firstName);
01838                 patron.setLastName(lastName);
01839                 patron.setUserId(userId);
01840                 patron.setAuthority(authorisationLevel);
01841 
01842 
01844                 // Finished manual construction of MemberType.
01846 
01847 
01848 
01849 
01850 
01851                 // Show the patron details
01853                 cout << endl;
01854                 cout << endl;
01855                 string spc = "     ";
01856                 cout << spc << "Finished entering patron details: " << endl;
01857                 cout << endl;
01858                 cout << spc << "---------------" << endl;
01859                 cout << spc << " First Name:          " << firstName          << endl;
01860                 cout << spc << " Last Name:           " << lastName           << endl;
01861                 cout << spc << " User Id:             " << userId             << endl;
01862                 cout << spc << " Authorisation Level: " << authorisationLevel << endl;
01863                 cout << spc << "---------------" << endl;
01864                 cout << endl;
01865 
01866 
01867 
01868 
01869 
01870 
01871                 string confirm = "";
01872                 while(!confirm.length())
01873                 {
01874                         // Ask to commit.
01875                         cout << "Do you want to add this patron to the system? (y/n)" << endl;
01876                         cout << endl;
01877                         confirm = "";
01878                         getline (cin, confirm);
01879                 }
01880                 if (confirm == "y" || confirm == "Y" || confirm == "yes" || confirm == "YES" || confirm == "Yes")
01881                 {
01882                         // Commit
01883                         usersVect.push_back(patron);
01884                         cout << "Patron has been added to the system." << endl;
01885                         cout << endl;
01886                 }
01887                 else
01888                 {
01889                         // Discard
01890                         cout << "New patron details have been discarded." << endl;
01891                         cout << endl;
01892                 }
01893 
01894 
01895                 cout << endl;
01896                 cout << endl;
01897                 cout << "Add another patron? (y/n)" << endl;
01898                 cout << endl;
01899                 confirm = "";
01900                 getline (cin, confirm);
01901                 if (!confirm.length() || confirm == "n" || confirm == "N" || confirm == "no" || confirm == "NO" || confirm == "No")
01902                 {
01903                         again = false; // Done adding patrons.
01904                 }
01905                 cout << endl;
01906                 cout << endl;
01907                 cout << endl;
01908         }
01909         return false;
01910 }

01913 
01917 void LibSystem::run()
01918 {
01919 
01920         running = true;
01921 
01922         loggedIn = false;
01923 
01924         admin = false;
01925 
01926 
01927         while(running)
01928         {
01929 
01930                 if (!loggedIn)
01931                 {
01932                         // NOT LOGGED IN
01933 
01934                         displayWelcomeMessage();
01935 
01936                         displayAllUsers();
01937 
01938                         waitForLogin();
01939 
01940                 }
01941                 else
01942                 {
01943                         // LOGGED IN
01944 
01945                         displayMainMenu();
01946 
01947                         mainMenuResponse();
01948 
01949                 }
01950         }
01951 }
